scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix frontend" "npm run start --prefix backend"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.port: lsof -i :5000 -t | xargs ps -p | grep node | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.kill: lsof -ti :5173 | xargs kill -9; lsof -ti :3000 | xargs kill -9
